articles.title: Watch: Veterinarians Fix Seal's Gaping Neck Wound From Plastic Packing Band
articles.description: The huge wound was first noticed by lifeguards off the coast of Argentina, who initiated a rescue.
articles.content:
Shocked marine wildlife experts have released harrowing footage of a seal left with a gaping neck wound after it became entangled in plastic packaging.

articles.title: Argentina grains truckers and government set virtual meeting to end strike
articles.description: Argentina's truckers and government officials agreed on Thursday to have a virtual meeting in order to reach an agreement to end a protest by truck owners demanding higher freight rates.

articles.title: World's largest fried cake cooked up at festival in Argentina
articles.description: Organizers of a festival in Argentina said they broke a Guinness World Record by cooking up a fried cake measuring about 16 feet in diameter.
articles.content:
April 13 (UPI) -- Organizers of a festival in Argentina said they broke a Guinness World Record by cooking up a fried cake measuring about 16 feet in diameter.
